testsuite.name: Publisher Application
testsuite.details:
Publisher Application

  1. Create Pub APP ID
  2. Create Placement ID
  3. Edit & Details page of Pub APP ID & Placement ID

testcase.name: Publishing Application
testcase.summary: To check functionality when user clicks on Publisher Application
testcase.preconditions: User should be login

step.actions: 1. Click on "Add New Application"
step.expectedresults: Application should get redirected on Create new Publisher Application page

testcase.name: Create a pub application
testcase.summary: To create new Publisher Application
testcase.preconditions:
1. User should be login
2. Click on "Add New Application"

step.actions:
Enter necessary valid details such as:
1. Select Platform such as iOS/Android
2. Enter Application Name
3. Select checkbox for My app is live on the app store
4. Add following App store URL
iOS Store URL: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/ibotta-better-than-coupons/id559887125?mt=8&uo=4
Android Store URL: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ibotta.android&hl=en
5. Select Category from Drop down list
6. Click on "Submit" button
step.expectedresults: New Publisher Application should get created with default status as Test Mode along with unique PUB APP ID

testcase.name: Verify legacy ads on Test Mode
testcase.summary: To verify Legacy ads  on Test Mode
testcase.preconditions: 1. Create Pub ID and verify that status is present in testmode

step.actions:
1. Add created Pub ID on Application
2. Play application
step.expectedresults: When PUB APP in test mode . Application should receive Legacy ads.

testcase.name: Active Publishing Application
testcase.summary: To check active Publishing Application
testcase.preconditions: Publisher Application should be created and associated with advertiser id

step.actions: 1. Change Publisher Application status fromTest Mode to Active
step.expectedresults:
Publisher Application status should be changed as Active.
(App should receiving associated CloudUX Ads)

testcase.name: Verify Mraid ads
testcase.summary: To verify for Mraid ads
testcase.preconditions:
1. Create Pub ID and status as Active
2. Create and Associate Advertiser to Pub ID and Pub ID to Advertiser
3. Add new Campaign for Advertiser and create new Creative for Campaign and status should be active for Campaign & creative

step.actions:
1. Add created Pub ID on Application
2. Initialise application and play ad
step.expectedresults: Application should recevied Mraid ads.

testcase.name: Inactive Publishing Application Status
testcase.summary: To check the Publishing Application status in Inactive mode
testcase.preconditions: Publisher Application should be created

step.actions: 1. Change Publisher Application status to Inactive
step.expectedresults:
Publisher Application status should be changed as Inactive.
(App should no longer receive Vungle ads.)
It should show config 400/500 error in charles

testcase.name: Edit Publisher Application
testcase.summary: To edit Publisher Application
testcase.preconditions: Publisher Application should be already created

step.actions: 1. On Publisher Application page click on Edit option of Application details/Publisher settings icon.
step.expectedresults: Edit publisher Application page should be displayed and user should be able to update details.

testcase.name: Add Placement ID
testcase.summary: To check the placement ID
testcase.preconditions: Publisher Application should be created

step.actions:
1. Click on "Add New Placement"
2. Enter details and submit form.
step.expectedresults:
1. Application should redirect user to create Placement page.
2. If user enter valid details then form should get submitted sucessfully else respective alert should get displayed.

testcase.name: Rewarded option for placement ID
testcase.summary: Check Rewarded option for placement ID
testcase.preconditions: User should be login

step.actions:
1. Click on existing/new createed placement ID
2. Check/uncheck rewarded option.
3. Observe
step.expectedresults:
1.User should be able to check/uncheck the rewarded checkbox.
2.If checked: Rewarded ad should play for respective placement ID.
3.If unchecked: non-rewarded ad should play for respective placement ID

testcase.name: CPM Floor for placement ID
testcase.summary: Check CPM Floor
testcase.preconditions: User should be login

step.actions:
1.Click on existing/new created placement ID
2.Enter value in CPM floor text and submit.
step.expectedresults:
1.User should be able to enter any integer value in CPM floor
2.Only integer value be accepted by application.

testcase.name: Supported Ad Formats for placement ID
testcase.summary: Check Supported Ad Formats for placement id
testcase.preconditions: User should be login

step.actions:
1.Click edit button on existing/new created placement ID
2.Click on Supported ad format and select any option from list
step.expectedresults:
1.User should able to select any adtypes from dropdown list.
2.List of adtypes should get displayed when user click on adtype formats.

testcase.name: Supported Template Types for placement ID
testcase.summary: Check Supported template types for placement id
testcase.preconditions: User should be login

step.actions:
1.Click on edit button on existing/new created placement ID
2.Click on Supported template and select any option from list
step.expectedresults:
1.User should able to select any template format from drop down list.
2.List of template formats should displayed when user click on template formats.

testcase.name: Edit Placement ID
testcase.summary: Edit existing Placement ID
testcase.preconditions: Already new placement ID should be available.

step.actions:
1. Click on Edit icon of placement 
2. Edit exiting details.
3. Submit form.
step.expectedresults: Application should get redirected to edit placement page and user should be able to update placement details.

testcase.name: Platform > iOS
testcase.summary: To create pub id for Apple iOS
testcase.preconditions:
1. User should be login
2. Click on "Add New Application"
3. Select Platform as iOS

step.actions:
1. Enter new Application Name
2. Fill all details and Click on Submit button
step.expectedresults: Publisher ID should be created for iOS application

testcase.name: Platform > Android
testcase.summary: To create pub id for Apple Android
testcase.preconditions:
1. User should be login
2. Click on "Add New Application"
3. Select Platform as Android

step.actions:
1. Enter new Application Name
2. Fill all details and Click on Submit button
step.expectedresults: Publisher ID should be created for Android application

testcase.name: Platform >Windows
testcase.summary: To create pub id for Apple Windows
testcase.preconditions:
1. User should be login

2. Click on "Add New Application"
3. Select Platform as Windows

step.actions:
1. Enter new Application Name
2. Fill all details and Click on Submit button
step.expectedresults: Publisher ID should be created for Windows application

testcase.name: My app is live on the app store
testcase.summary: To check option for My app is live on the app store if checkbox is selected
testcase.preconditions:
1. User should be login
2. Click on "Add New Application"
3. Select Platform iOS/Android/Windows
4. Enter Application Name
5. Select checkbox for My app is live on the app store

step.actions:
1. Add respective App Store URL in text box such as
iOS Store URL: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/ibotta-better-than-coupons/id559887125?mt=8&uo=4
Android Store URL: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ibotta.android&hl=en
2. Enter all details and Submit form
step.expectedresults: Entered details should get saved for respective Platform

testcase.name: My app is live on the app store unchecked
testcase.summary: To check functionality if My app is live on the app store checkbox is not selected
testcase.preconditions:
1. User should be login
2. Click on "Add New Application"
3. Select Platform iOS/Android/Windows
4. Enter Application Name
5. Do not select checkbox for "My app is live on the app store"

step.actions: Associate existing advertiser
step.expectedresults: PopUp error should display on screen when user try to associate existing advertiser without entering iOS/Android Store URL.

testcase.name: Category
testcase.summary: To check Category drop down
testcase.preconditions:
1. User should be login
2. Click on "Add New Application"
3. Select Platform iOS/Android/Windows
4. Enter Application Name

step.actions: 1.Click on Category drop down
step.expectedresults:
1. User should be able to select different Category from Category dropdown list
2.Category list should displayed in sorted manner when user click on dropdown button.

testcase.name: Orientation > Both
testcase.summary: To check Orientation option for publisher Application
testcase.preconditions:
1. Create new application and select Orientation drop down option as" Both"
2. Fill all details and Submit Application

step.actions:
1. Enter created Pub ID on Application
2. Initialize application and play ad
step.expectedresults: While rotating device ads should work properly in portrait and landscape mode

testcase.name: Orientation > Portrait
testcase.summary: To check Orientation option as Portrait mode for publisher Application
testcase.preconditions:
1. Create new application and select Orientation drop down option as" Portrait"
2. Enter all details and Submit Application

step.actions:
1. Enter created Pub ID on App
2. Initialize application and play ad
step.expectedresults: While rotating device ads should play properly only in portrait mode

testcase.name: Orientation > Landscape
testcase.summary: To check Orientation option as Landscape mode for publisher Application
testcase.preconditions:
1. Create new application and select Orientation drop down option as" Landscape"
2. Enter all details and Submit Application

step.actions:
1. Enter created Pub ID on App
2. Initialise app and play ad
step.expectedresults: While rotating device, ad should work properly only in Landscape mode

testcase.name: Publisher > Logging > Requests - last 100
testcase.summary: To check Logging request as last 100
testcase.preconditions: Edit Pub APP ID

testcase.name: Publisher > Logging > Installs - last 100
testcase.summary: To check Logging request asinstall 100
testcase.preconditions: User should be login

testcase.name: Publisher > Ignore Creative Caps >checked
testcase.summary: To check Ignore Creative Caps functionality when checkbox is selected
testcase.preconditions: 1. New publisher Application should be created with checkbox Yes for Ignore Creative Caps

step.actions:
1.Click edit button on existing Pub APP
2.Check/uncheck Ignore Creative and save form
step.expectedresults:
1. User should be able to check/uncheck checkbox.
2. If checked: -Creative caps should limit the number of times specific creatives displayed by a single device.

testcase.name: Publisher > Ignore Creative Caps > unchecked
testcase.summary: To check Ignore Creative Caps functionality when checkbox is not selected
testcase.preconditions:
1. New publisher Application should be created
2. Do not Select Ignore Creative Caps checkbox

step.actions:
1.Click on edit option for existing Pub APP
2.Check/uncheck Ignore Creative
step.expectedresults:
1. User should be able to check/uncheck checkbox.
2. If unchecked : -Creative caps should not limit the number of times specific creatives displayed by a single device.

testcase.name: Publisher> Dynamic Templates Settings > Supported Template Types
testcase.summary: To check Supported Template Types for publisher Application
testcase.preconditions: 1. New publisher Application should be created

step.actions:
Create new Publisher
select Single page full screen or multi page full screen option
step.expectedresults: Publisher Application should support Single page full screen or multi page full template

testcase.name: Publisher> Dynamic Templates Settings > Allow A/B testing
testcase.summary: To check template option for Allow A/B testing
testcase.preconditions:
1. New publisher Application should be created
2. Select checkbox for Allow A/B testing

step.actions:
1. Enter Publisher ID on App
2. Initialise app and play add
step.expectedresults: Publisher should receive ads as per added creatives

testcase.name: Publisher> Dynamic Templates Settings > Template Whitelist
testcase.summary: To check Template Whitelist options
testcase.preconditions: User should be login

step.actions:
1. Goto publisher section.
2. View existing publisher list.
3. Click edit button on any existing Pub APP
4. Click on Template whitelist
step.expectedresults:
1.When user click on template Whitelist then user should able to add reuired templates.
2.Template list should get displayed.

testcase.name: Publisher> Dynamic Templates Settings > Template Whitelist > Select all current and future templates
testcase.summary: To verify option for Select all current and future templates
testcase.preconditions: User should be login

step.actions:
1. Goto publisher section.
2. View existing publisher list.
3. Click edit button on any existing Pub APP
4. Click on Template whitelist
step.expectedresults: Pub APP should be able to support all current & future templates

testcase.name: Publisher > Custom setting for Close button
testcase.summary: To check custom settings for Close button for Dynamic Templates
testcase.preconditions: User should be login

step.actions:
1. Goto publisher section.
2. View existing publisher list.
3. Click edit button on any existing Pub APP
4.Check/Uncheck custom setting checkbox for close button
step.expectedresults:
1.If checked :User should be able to custom close button for rewarded/non rewarded ads with option like (immediate , delayed or forced).
2.If Unchecked : User should be unable to custom close button for rewarded/non-rewarded ads with option like (immediate , delayed or forced).

testcase.name: Publisher > Replacements > Incentivized text
testcase.summary: Check functionality when user customize Incentivized dialog box
testcase.preconditions: User should be login

step.actions:
1.Click edit button on existing Pub APP
2.Customise incentivized dialog box.
step.expectedresults:
1.If user customize dialog box then text value should reflect similarly on Ads.
2.If user do not customize dialog box then default value should get displayed on ads.

testcase.name: Publisher > Replacements > Start Muted
testcase.summary: Check Start muted checkbox functionality
testcase.preconditions: User should be login

step.actions:
1.Click edit option on existing Pub APP
2.Check/Uncheck Start Mute option.
step.expectedresults:
1.Checked: Video should play with volume
2.Unchecked:- Video should Play without volume
3.User should be able to check/uncheck checkbox.

testcase.name: Publisher > Replacements > Video Progress Bar
testcase.summary: Check Video progress bar
testcase.preconditions: User should be login

step.actions:
1.Click edit button on existing Pub APP
2.Check/Uncheck Video progress bar option.
step.expectedresults:
1.Check: Video should play along with progress bar
2.Uncheck:- Video should Play without progress bar
3.User should able to check/uncheck checkbox.

testcase.name: Publisher > Ad customization > Frequency Cap
testcase.summary: Check Frequency CAP option
testcase.preconditions: User should be login

step.actions:
1.Click edit button on existing Pub APP
2.Enter value as 0/1/5 in frequency cap option.
step.expectedresults:
1.User should be able to enter only integer value.
2.If value is 0 then same video should repeat multipletimes on single app in one day
3.If value is 2/4 then Video should repeat as defined value on single App in one day

testcase.name: Publisher > Ad customization >Daily View Limit
testcase.summary: Check Daily View Limit option
testcase.preconditions: User should be login

step.actions:
1.Click edit button on existing Pub APP
2.Enter value as 0/1/5 in frequency cap option.
step.expectedresults:
1.User should be able to enter only integer value.
2.If value is 0 then multiple ads should display on App in one day
3.If value is 2/4 then Video should display as per defined value on App in one day

testcase.name: Publisher > Ad customization >Force View
testcase.summary: Check Force View option
testcase.preconditions: User should be login

step.actions:
1.Click edit button on existing Pub APP
2.Check/Uncheck option for close button.
3.Check/Uncheck option for incentivized button
step.expectedresults:
1.User should able to check/uncheck checkbox for close/incentivized button
2.If check :- "9999" value should display for close/incentivized button.
3.If Uncheck:- "5" value should display for close/incentivized button.

testcase.name: Publisher > Ad customization >OS Version
testcase.summary: Check OS version option
testcase.preconditions: User should be login

step.actions:
1.Click edit button on existing Pub APP

2.Enter valid os version
E.g : Android :- 5/6/7
IOS:- 6/10/11
step.expectedresults:
1.If entered android os version as 5 then created pub APP id should support 5 and above os version 

2.Created Pub APP ID should not support below os version 5.

testcase.name: Publisher > Ad customization >Maximum Ad Duration
testcase.summary: Check Ad duration option
testcase.preconditions: User should be login

step.actions:
1.Click edit button on existing Pub APP
2.Customize the Ad duration like 15/30/50 second
step.expectedresults:
1.User should be able to select ad duration.
2. If ad duration value is 15/30/40 second then, video duration on App should be as per defined value.

testcase.name: Publisher > Ad customization >Video Download Options
testcase.summary: Check network connection for video download
testcase.preconditions: User should be login

step.actions:
1.Click edit button on existing Pub APP
2.Select option such as Wifi Only/Wifi+WWAN
step.expectedresults:
1.User should be able to select wifi only/wifi+WWAN
2.Wifi Only: Video should download only when wifi is on
3.Wifi+WWAN:- Video should download when wifi or WWAN connection is available.

testcase.name: Publisher > Ad customization >Rewarded Callback URL
testcase.summary: Check rewarded callback URL
testcase.preconditions: User should be login

step.actions:
1.Click edit button on existing Pub APP
2.Enter reward callback URL
step.expectedresults:
1.User should able to enter call back URL
2.When user play complete rewarded ad then reward should get recieved by user.

testcase.name: Publisher > Ad customization >Show callback URL example?
testcase.summary: Check Show callback URl option
testcase.preconditions: User should be login

step.actions:
1.Click edit button on existing Pub APP
2.Click onShow callback URl option
step.expectedresults:
1.User should be able click on Show callback URl option.
2.When user click on Show callback URL option then details window should get opened.

testcase.name: Publisher > Ad customization >Hide callback URL example?
testcase.summary: Check hide callback URl option
testcase.preconditions: User should be login

step.actions:
1.Click edit button on existing Pub APP
2.Click onShow callback URl option
3.click on hode callback URl option
step.expectedresults:
1.User should be able click to hide callback URl option.
2.When user click on hide callback then URLoption details window should get closed.

testcase.name: Publisher > Application targeting > App Targeting
testcase.summary: Check App targeting option
testcase.preconditions: User should be login

step.actions:
1.Click edit button on existing Pub APP
2.Associate existing/newly create advertiser APP.
step.expectedresults:
1.User should be able to add any number of newly created/existing advertiser App.
2.Advertiser related Ad should play in App.

testcase.name: Publisher > Application targeting > Application tags and tag filtering
testcase.summary: Check App tags option
testcase.preconditions: User should be login

step.actions:
1.Click edit button on existing Pub APP
2.Click on App tags.
step.expectedresults:
1.List of tags should get displayed when user click on APP Tag.
2.User should be able to select any tag from list.

testcase.name: Publisher > Revenue controls >Default revenue share
testcase.summary: Check Default revenue share option
testcase.preconditions: User should be login

step.actions:
1.Click edit button on existing Pub APP
2.Enter any float integer value in default revenue share
step.expectedresults:
1.Text box should accept only integer value not character/alphabet.
2.User should able to enter any integer value

testcase.name: Publisher > Revenue controls > Add geo level revenue share
testcase.summary: Check geo level revenue option
testcase.preconditions: User should be login

step.actions:
1.Click edit button on existing Pub APP
2.Add geo level revenue share. (Add country and rate)
step.expectedresults:
1.User should be able to add country and rate in geo level revenue text.
2.User should be able to select add geo level option.
3.User should be able to add multiple country fr geo level revenue.

testcase.name: Publisher > Revenue controls >Serving Cost Revenue Share
testcase.summary: Check Serving Cost Revenue Share
testcase.preconditions: User should be login

step.actions:
1.Click edit button on existing Pub APP
2.Enter value in Serving Cost Revenue Share text.
step.expectedresults:
1.Only integer value should be accepted.
2.User should be able to enter value of Serving Cost Revenue Share

testcase.name: Publisher > Advanced settings > Allowed Ad Types
testcase.summary: Check Allowed Ad Types
testcase.preconditions: User should be login

step.actions:
1.Click edit button on existing Pub APP
2.Click on Allowed Ad Types and select any option from list
step.expectedresults:
1.User should be able to select any adtypes from dropdown list.
2.List of adtypes should get displayed when user click on adtype option.

testcase.name: Publisher > Advanced settings > Allowed Ad Delivery Types
testcase.summary: Check Allowed Ad Delivery Types
testcase.preconditions: User should be login

step.actions:
1.Click edit button on existing Pub APP
2.Click on Allowed Ad Delivery Types and select any option from list
step.expectedresults:
1.User should be able to select any ad delivery type from dropdown list.
2.List of ad delivery types should get displayed when user click on adtype option.

testcase.name: Create new Placement ID
testcase.summary: To create new Placement ID
testcase.preconditions: Publisher Application should be created

step.actions:
On Create Placement page fill all necessary details
1. Select Publisher Application from Application drop down list
2. Add new Placement name
3. Click on "Submit" button
step.expectedresults:
1.New Placement should be created with unique Placement reference ID.
2.Duplicate placement ID should not be created.

testcase.name: Submit button of New Placement Application
testcase.summary: To check New Placement Application without entering all details
testcase.preconditions:
1. User should be login
2. Click on "Add New Placement" button

step.actions: Do not enter any details and submit form
step.expectedresults:
Form should not get submitted. 
Respective alert should get displayed to user.

testcase.name: Activity section of publisher application
testcase.summary: To check when user makes changes in his publisher application then those changes reflected in activity section of publisher application.
testcase.preconditions:
1.User should be logged in.

2.Publisher app should be created.

step.actions:
1.Search existing publisher app in Global search.

2.Click on setting icon of searched app.

3.Make changes in pulisher application.

4. Observe activity section.
step.expectedresults: When user makes changes in publisher application then those changes should get reflected in activity section of publisher application.

testsuite.name: Advertiser Application
testsuite.details:
Advertiser Application

  1. Create Advertiser Application
  2. Create Campagin
  3. Create Creative
  4. Edit & details pages of campagin & creative
  5. Account stage

testcase.name: Create new Advertiser Application
testcase.summary: To check Advertiser Application
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged in

step.actions:
1. Click on Advertiser section.
2. Click on option to ad new application
step.expectedresults: It should be redirected on Create new Application page

testcase.name: Tabbing functionality
testcase.summary: To verify tabbing functionality
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged in

step.actions:
1. Go on Add new advertiser application
2. Verify tabbing functionality
step.expectedresults:
1. Tabbing functionality should work correctly.
2. User should visit next field by clicking on tab option.
3. User should visit previous field when clicked on shift+tab.

testcase.name: Verify cancel button functionality
testcase.summary: To verify cancel button functionality
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged in

step.actions:
1. Go on Add new advertiser application
2. Click on cancel button option.
3. Observe
step.expectedresults:
1. Form should not get submitted.
2. User should get redirected to previous page.

testcase.name: Verify presence of mandatory fields
testcase.summary: To verify mandatory fields
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged in

step.actions:
1. Go on Add new advertiser application
2. Do not enter anything
3. Click on Submit option
step.expectedresults:
1. Form should not get submitted with blank fields.
2. Alerts should get displayed to enter application name and category.

testcase.name: Verify sorting order of dropdowns displayed
testcase.summary: Verify sorting order of dropdowns like (Category, default action, Orientation)
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged in

step.actions:
1. Go on Add new advertiser application
2. Observe sorting order of dropdown field
step.expectedresults: 1. Dropdowns displayed should be sorted in ascending manner.

testcase.name: To verify functionality when user selects app is live checkbox
testcase.summary: Verify "App is live" checkbox
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged in

step.actions:
1. Go on Add new advertiser application
2. Enter application name
3. Select "My app is live on app store" checkbox
4. Observe
step.expectedresults:
1. Text box should get displayed to enter App store URL.
2. User should be able to enter App store URL.

testcase.name: To verify functionality when user adds valid details and submit form
testcase.summary: Valid Input
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged in

step.actions:
1. Go on Add new advertiser application
2. Enter valid details and submit form
3. Observe
step.expectedresults:
1. Form should get submitted successfully.
2. Success message should get displayed to user.

testcase.name: Edit application id with invalid input
testcase.summary: Invalid Input
testcase.preconditions: Application id should be created

step.actions:
1. Select existing application id to update
2. Enter invalid details and submit form
3. Observe
step.expectedresults:
1. Form should not get submitted.
2. Respective alert should get displayed.

testcase.name: Edit application id with valid input
testcase.summary: Valid Input
testcase.preconditions: Application id should be created

step.actions:
1. Select existing application id to update
2. Enter valid details and submit form
3. Observe
step.expectedresults:
1. Form should get submitted successfully.
2. Success message should get displayed to user.

testcase.name: Verify duplication of details entered
testcase.summary: Verify duplicate records
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged in

step.actions:
1. Go on Add new advertiser application
2. Enter duplicate application name.
3. Submit form
step.expectedresults:
1. Form should not get submitted.
2. User should be notified about duplicate application name.
3. Respective alert should get displayed to user.

testcase.name: Verify search by application name functionality
testcase.summary: Verify search by application name
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged in

step.actions:
1. Go to creative listing.
2. Search with respect to application name
3. Observe
step.expectedresults:
1. Search functionality should work correctly.
2. Results should get filtered as per entered search criteria.
3. When clicked on "clear" entered search criteria should get cleared.

testcase.name: Verify Account textbox
testcase.summary: To verify Account textbox field
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged in

step.actions:
1. Open Advertiser section.
2. Go to Application listing.
3. Select option to add new application.
4. Observe account field
step.expectedresults: 1. Random account number should get generated and displayed.

testcase.name: Verify platform radio buttons
testcase.summary: To verify platform option radio buttons
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged in

step.actions:
1. Open Advertiser section.
2. Go to Application listing.
3. Select option to add new application.
4. Verify platform radio buttons
step.expectedresults:
1. By default any 1 checkbox should be seen as selected.
2. As per user selected platform, app id should get created.

testcase.name: Verify type of application radio buttons
testcase.summary: To verify application radio buttons
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged in

step.actions:
1. Open Advertiser section.
2. Go to Application listing.
3. Select option to add new application.
4. Check type of application
step.expectedresults:
1. User should be able to select application type.
2. By default any 1 radio button should be seen selected.

testcase.name: Verify Orientation field dropdown
testcase.summary: To verify Orientation field dropdown
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged in

step.actions:
1. Open Advertiser section.
2. Go to Application listing.
3. Select option to add new application.
4. Check orientation field
step.expectedresults:
1. Dropdowns displayed should be sorted in ascending manner.
2. User should be able to select any required value from dropdown.

testcase.name: Verify logging checkbox
testcase.summary: To verify logging checkboxes
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged in

step.actions:
1. Open Advertiser section.
2. Go to Application listing.
3. Select option to add new application.
4. Check logging functionality

testcase.name: Verify app targeting field
testcase.summary: To verify app targeting field
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged in

step.actions:
1. Open Advertiser section.
2. Go to Application listing.
3. Select option to add new application.
4. Check app targeting field
step.expectedresults: 1. User should be able to enter Active app name.

testcase.name: Verify "copy all" link within app targeting
testcase.summary: To verify "copy all" link functionality
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged in

step.actions:
1. Open Advertiser section.
2. Go to Application listing.
3. Select option to add new application.
4. Check copy all link functionality
step.expectedresults: 1. All options available in dropdown list should get copied

testcase.name: Verify "remove all" link within app targeting
testcase.summary: To verify "remove all" link functionality
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged in

step.actions:
1. Open Advertiser section.
2. Go to Application listing.
3. Select option to add new application.
4. Check remove all link functionality
step.expectedresults: 1. All options added within app targeting should get removed

testcase.name: Verify app tags field
testcase.summary: To verify app tags field
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged in

step.actions:
1. Open Advertiser section.
2. Go to Application listing.
3. Select option to add new application.
4. Check app tags field
step.expectedresults:

testcase.name: Verify tag based filtering field
testcase.summary: To verify tag based filtering field
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged in

step.actions:

2. Go to Application listing.

step.expectedresults:

testcase.name: Verify default action dropdown
testcase.summary: To verify default action dropdown
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged in

step.actions:
1. Open Advertiser section.
2. Go to Application listing.
3. Select option to add new application.
4. Check default action dropdown
step.expectedresults:
1.User should be able to select any action from drop down list
2.Show- Tag should display on App
3.Hide - Tag should hide on App

testcase.name: Verify Advertiser settings
testcase.summary: To verify advertiser settings displayed
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged in

step.actions:
1. Open Advertiser section.
2. Go to Application listing.
3. Select option to add new application.
4. Check advertiser settings
step.expectedresults:
1.User should able to enter any integer vale for clicks look back period.
(Number of days a click can be attributed. Use 0 to disable.)
2.User should able to enter any integer vale for Views look back period.
(Number of days a view can be attributed. Use 0 to disable.)

testcase.name: Advertiser campaign
testcase.summary: To add campaign form
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged in

step.actions:
1. Click on Advertiser section.
2. Click on option to ad new campaign
step.expectedresults: User should be redirected on Create new campaign page

testcase.name: Tabbing functionality
testcase.summary: To verify tabbing functionality
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged in

step.actions:
1. Go on Add new campaign
2. Verify tabbing functionality
step.expectedresults:
1. Tabbing functionality should work correctly.
2. User should visit next field by clicking on tab option.
3. User should visit previous field when clicked on shift+tab.

testcase.name: Verify cancel button functionality
testcase.summary: To verify cancel button functionality
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged in

step.actions:
1. Go on Add new campaign
2. Click on cancel button option.
3. Observe
step.expectedresults:
1. Form should not get submitted.
2. User should get redirected to previous page.

testcase.name: Verify presence of mandatory fields
testcase.summary: To verify mandatory fields
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged in

step.actions:
1. Go on Add new campaign
2. Do not enter anything
3. Click on Submit option
step.expectedresults:
1. Form should not get submitted with blank fields.
2. Alerts should get displayed to enter campaign name and category.

testcase.name: Verify sorting order of dropdowns displayed
testcase.summary: Verify sorting order
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged in

step.actions:
1. Go on Add new campaign
2. Observe sorting order of dropdown field
step.expectedresults: 1. Dropdowns displayed should be sorted in ascending manner.

testcase.name: Verify duplication of details entered
testcase.summary: Verify duplicate records
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged in

step.actions:
1. Go on Add new campaign
2. Enter duplicate campaign name.
3. Submit form
step.expectedresults:
1. Form should not get submitted.
2. User should be notified about duplicate campaign name.
3. Respective alert should get displayed to user.

testcase.name: To verify time validation
testcase.summary: Verify time validation
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged in

step.actions:
1. Go on Add new campaign
2. Verify time validation
3. Submit form
step.expectedresults:
1. Start time should always be greater than end time.
2. User should not be able to enter invalid time details.

testcase.name: To verify eRPM override field

testcase.preconditions: User should be logged in

step.actions:

2. Select option to add new campaign.

step.expectedresults: 1. Given app target amount should be received after given rRPM value

testcase.name: To verify creative optimization override field
testcase.summary: verify creative optimization override field
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged in

step.actions:
1. Go to Advertiser section.
2. Select option to add new campaign.
3. Check creative optimization override field
step.expectedresults:
1.User should able to check/uncheck this field
2.Creative optimization allows Data Science to impact which creative will show to each user based on previous performance. By unchecking this option, each attached creative will play an equal percentage of this campaigns' views.

testcase.name: To verify creative timer override field
testcase.summary: verify creative timer override field
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged in

step.actions:
1. Go to Advertiser section.
2. Select option to add new campaign.
3. Check creative timer override field
step.expectedresults:
1.User should able to check/uncheck this field.
2.All creatives that this campaign serves will prioritize its close timers over any Publishers settings

testcase.name: To verify Win notice source field
testcase.summary: verify Win notice source field
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged in

step.actions:
1. Go to Advertiser section.
2. Select option to add new campaign.
3. Check Win notice source field
step.expectedresults:
1.User should able select SDK/Exchange option from this field.
2.This field defines what method will be used to hit the provided notification URL. If SDK is chosen, the request will be originated from the device itself in the moment of VIEW. If exchange is chosen, the request will be originated from our exchange server in the moment of AUCTION WIN as specified on the openRTB protocol. In general only 3rd party DSPs will want to use the latter.

testcase.name: Templates option
testcase.summary: To check user is redirected to Template page.
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged-in.

step.actions: 1.Click on Template option of hamburger.
step.expectedresults: User should get redirected to Template page after clicking on Template option.

testcase.name: New Template button
testcase.summary: To check the New Template button is clickable
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged-in.

step.actions: 1.Click on "New Template" button.
step.expectedresults: New Template button should be clickable.

testcase.name: New Template button functionality
testcase.summary: To check functionality of New Template button.
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged-in.

step.actions: 1.Click on "New Template" button.
step.expectedresults: User should be redirected to create template page.

testcase.name: Newly created template in table
testcase.summary: To check newly created template is visible in table.
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged-in.

step.actions:
1.Click on "New Template" button.
2.Select type from drop down list.
3.Enter template name.
4.Select status from drop down list.
5.Upload template file.
6.Click on submit button
step.expectedresults: Newly created template should be visible in the table.

testcase.name: Sorting of templates.
testcase.summary: To check user is able to sort templates by name/by format/by status/by created.
testcase.preconditions:
1.User should be logged-in.
2.Multiple templates should be created.

step.actions: 1.Click on various fields of table such as Name/format/status/created for sorting.
step.expectedresults: User should be able to sort templates according to his selection.

testcase.name: Update template
testcase.summary: To check user is able to update the already created template.
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged-in.

step.actions: 1.Click on update icon present in "Created" field of template table.
step.expectedresults: User should be able to update the already created template.

testcase.name: Create template with publisher name
testcase.summary: To check If perticualar publisher is selected then template will be eligible for that publisher only (i.e.Private).
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged-in.

step.actions:
1.Click on "New Template" button.
2.Select type from drop down list.
3.Enter template name.
4.Select status from drop down list.
5.Choose publisher from drop down list.
6.Upload template zip file.
7.Click on submit button
step.expectedresults:
1.Newly created template should be visible in the table.
2.Newly created template should be eligible for chosen publisher only.

testcase.name: Invalid template zip file
testcase.summary: To check if user upload invalid zip file of template.
testcase.preconditions: User should be logged-in.

step.actions:
1.Click on "New Template" button.
2.Select type from drop down list.
3.Enter template name.
4.Select status from drop down list.
5.Upload template file.
6.Click on submit button
step.expectedresults: Error message should get displayed if user upload invalid zip file of template.
